title: How to Make a Sun Up Sandwich

steps.headline: Put one teaspoon of butter or margarine in a measuring cup.
Microwave the measuring cup for 20 to 25 seconds until the butter or margarine is melted.
steps.description: Use hot pads or oven mitts to remove the measuring cup.

steps.headline: Crack an egg in the measuring cup.
steps.description: Then add one tablespoon of milk. Beat the mixture with a fork until the yolk is completely broken.

steps.headline: Microwave it for 25 seconds.
steps.description: Remove the measuring cup using hot pads or oven mitts.

steps.headline: Take the measuring cup out of the microwave.The egg should be firm but not runny.
Use a knife to cut the English muffin into a half.
Spread both slices with apricot preserve.
Put the cooked egg on one of the slices.
Add Canadian-style bacon or honey-roasted bacon on one slice.
Add one slice of American cheese.
Put the English muffin slice on top.

text: Put one teaspoon of butter or margarine in a measuring cup.  Microwave the measuring cup for 20 to 25 seconds until the butter or margarine is melted. Use hot pads or oven mitts to remove the measuring cup. Crack an egg in the measuring cup. Then add one tablespoon of milk. Beat the mixture with a fork until the yolk is completely broken. Microwave it for 25 seconds. Remove the measuring cup using hot pads or oven mitts. Stir with a fork.  Microwave for 20 more seconds.  Take the measuring cup out of the microwave.The egg should be firm but not runny.  Use a knife to cut the English muffin into a half.  Spread both slices with apricot preserve.  Put the cooked egg on one of the slices.  Add Canadian-style bacon or honey-roasted bacon on one slice.  Add one slice of American cheese.  Put the English muffin slice on top.  Microwave it for 30 seconds.  Eat and enjoy!
